author: Admin
title: Nigeria appoints Budget Office DG
text:
Nigeria appoints Budget Office DG 
From OKORO CHINEDU in Lagos, Nigeria LAGOS, (CAJ News) – NIGERIAN President Muhammadu Buhari has appointed Aliyu Yahaya Gusau as Director-General of the Budget Office. 
The appointment takes effect immediately with a term of four years renewable for a further term of four years. 
Marshall Gundu, Director, Press and Public Relations at Federal Ministry of Finance, confirmed the appointment. 
Until his appointment, Gusau was the Director, Fiscal Policy, Budget Monitoring and Evaluation and Acting Director- General, Budget Office of the Federation at the exit of the former Director- General, Dr Bright Okogu. 
The new DG Budget Office of the Federation (BOF) hails from Zamfara State. 
He holds a Bachelor of Science (BSC) Degree in Economics from Ahmadu Bello University Zaria.
